sentences.en: At last, the operant evaluations can regulate and guide the execution of the strategy.
sentences.cn: 最后通过可操作性的评价体系来规范和引导思维训练策略的实施.

sentences.en: BDNF in the hippocampus maybe involves in operant conditioned reflex of rats.
sentences.cn: 海马部位的BDNF可能与操作性条件反射的训练有关.

sentences.en: Method Rats were randomly operant conditioning training group, operation control group and blank control group.
sentences.cn: 研究方法:大鼠分为实验组 、 手术对照组和空白对照组.

sentences.en: The actual tests would employ the well-honed methods of operant conditioning, developed initially on pigeons, in which the test subject has first to work out what is going on by trial and error.
sentences.cn: 实际的测试会采用精确的操作性条件反射方法，测试对象首先要清楚实验的过程和错误。

sentences.en: There are two corollaries of operant conditioning Aversion therapy and desensitization.
sentences.cn: 使事情发生动作的条件有2种推论,厌恶疗法及减敏.
